DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package ================================
=Supported versions= v2018.2
=Setup= * The Agent should be able to access UiPath rest API endpoint URL in order to make HTTP requests. * Internet Connection should be available on Agent OS.
=Common Inputs= - REST API URL*: Provide the URL of the UiPath REST API. E.g. https://api.asm.ca.com/1.6 - Tenant Name*: Provide the tenant name for the REST API authentication. E.g. tenant1 - Username: Provide the username for the REST API authentication. E.g. ca_integrations@abc.com - Password: Provide the password for the REST API authentication.
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PUB.ACTION.GET_ROBOT_LOGS * Action Description: This action will fetch logs for Robot(s) defined in UiPath Orchestrator.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PUB.ACTION.UPLOAD_PACKAGE * Action Description: This action uploads a new package on UiPath Orchestrator.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PUB.ACTION.START_JOB * Action Description: This action starts a job on UiPath Orchestrator.
